mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.username AS "username", a.password AS "password", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.name AS "name", a.is_online AS "isOnline", a.session_id AS "sessionId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user a
WHERE a.username = #{username} limit 0,1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user( id, username, password, create_date, name, is_online, session_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{createDate}, #{name}, #{isOnline}, #{sessionId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user a
ORDER BY a.create_date desc
